entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
